description: A dashboard that visualizes filter logs from pfSense and OPNsense using regex parsing.

targets.expr: sum by(action) (count_over_time({hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `$regexNonProto` | ipversion > 0 | action =~ `.+` [$__interval]))
sum by(action) (count_over_time({hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `$regexNonProto` | ipversion > 0 | action =~ `.+` [$__range]))
sum by(rule) (count_over_time({hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `$regexNonProto` | ipversion > 0 | action =~ `.+`   [$__range]))

sum by(protocol) (count_over_time({hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `(?i)$regexNonProto,\w+,\w+,\w+,(?P<protocol>tcp|udp)` | regexp `(?i)$regexNonProto,\w+,\w*,\w+,\w+,\w+,\w+,\w+,(?P<protocol>tcp|udp|carp)` | ipversion > 0 | label_format protocol="{{.protocol | ToLower }}" [$__range]))

sum by(protocol, ipversion) (count_over_time({hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `(?i)$regexNonProto,\w+,\w+,\w+,(?P<protocol>tcp|udp)` | regexp `(?i)$regexNonProto,\w+,\w*,\w+,\w+,\w+,\w+,\w+,(?P<protocol>tcp|udp|carp)` | ipversion > 0 | label_format protocol="{{.protocol | ToLower }}" [$__range]))
sum by(dstport) (count_over_time({hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `$regexipv4` | regexp `$regexipv6` | ipversion > 0 [$__range]))
{hostname=~"$hostname", app="filterlog"} | regexp `$regexipv6` | ipversion = `6` | label_format protocol="{{.protocol | ToLower }}"

title: OPNsense Filter
